description: A collection of technical terms and their definitions

terms.definition: Configuration type that uses the config.json file to configure Sources, Clients, and all application configuration together
Services that recieve/store Scrobbles sent by Multi-Scrobbler.
Configuration type that uses environmental variales to configure Sources and Clients
A variable passed to a docker container or present in the operating environment.
Configuration type that uses individual JSON files to configure Sources and Clients
The data related to a specific piece of audio you listened to, without a timestamp. EX: Artist, Title, Album...
A service/app that Multi-Scrobbler can get listening activity/history from.
The data (Play) and timestamp related to a certain song you listened to at a specific time
The verb for sending a Scrobble to one or more Clients
